00031 class FeatureIndexSorter {
00032    public:
00036       FeatureIndexSorter( const TileMap* theMap ) : m_map( theMap ) {}
00037        
00042       static int getFeatureImportance( int featureType ) {
00043          switch ( featureType ) {
00044             // Route features.
00045             case ( TileFeature::route_origin ) :
00046                return -3;
00047             case ( TileFeature::route_destination ) :
00048                return -2;
00049             case ( TileFeature::route_park_car ) :
00050                return -1;
00051 
00052             // The least important road features should be drawn below
00053             // the more important ones.
00054             case ( TileFeature::street_class_0_level_0 ) :
00055                return 20;
00056             case ( TileFeature::street_class_1_level_0 ) :
00057                return 21;
00058             case ( TileFeature::street_class_2_level_0 ) :
00059                return 22;
00060             case ( TileFeature::street_class_3_level_0 ) :
00061                return 23;
00062             case ( TileFeature::street_class_4_level_0 ) :
00063                return 24;
00064 
00065             // Citycenters.
00066             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_2 ) :
00067                return 50;
00068             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_4 ) :
00069                return 51;
00070             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_5 ) :
00071                return 52;
00072             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_7 ) :
00073                return 53;
00074             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_8 ) :
00075                return 54;
00076             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_10 ) :
00077                return 55;
00078             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_11 ) :
00079                return 56;
00080             case ( TileFeature::city_centre_12 ) :
00081                return 57;
00082             // Other POI:s
00083             case ( TileFeature::airport ) :
00084                return 60;
00085             case ( TileFeature::church ) :
00086                return 61;
00087             case ( TileFeature::tourist_attraction ) :
00088                return 62;
00089             case ( TileFeature::railway_station ) :
00090                return 63;
00091             case ( TileFeature::commuter_railstation ) :
00092                return 64;
00093             case ( TileFeature::bus_station ) :
00094                return 65;
00095             case ( TileFeature::petrol_station ) :
00096                return 66;
00097             case ( TileFeature::tourist_office ) :
00098                return 67;
00099             case ( TileFeature::hospital ) :
00100                return 68;
00101             // The rest.
00102             default :
00103                // We want to sort the features on feature type so that
00104                // the transferred tilemaps will be smaller.
00105                return featureType + 1000;
00106          }
00107       }
00108       
00112       bool operator() ( int a, int b ) const {
00113          // Check that everything is in order.
00114          MC2_ASSERT( m_map != NULL );
00115          MC2_ASSERT( m_map->getFeature( a ) != NULL );
00116          MC2_ASSERT( m_map->getFeature( b ) != NULL );
00117          
00118          // Get the features.   
00119          const TileFeature* aFeature = m_map->getFeature( a );
00120          const TileFeature* bFeature = m_map->getFeature( b );
00121          
00122          // Get the feature types.
00123          int aType = aFeature->getType();
00124          int bType = bFeature->getType();
00125         
00126          if ( aType != bType ) {
00127             return getFeatureImportance( aType ) < 
00128                    getFeatureImportance( bType );
00129          } 
00130 
00131          // Same type. Sort on image_name argument if present. 
00132          const StringArg* aImageName = 
00133             static_cast<const StringArg*> (
00134                aFeature->getArg( TileArgNames::image_name ) );
00135          const StringArg* bImageName = 
00136             static_cast<const StringArg*> (
00137                bFeature->getArg( TileArgNames::image_name ) );
00138          if ( aImageName != NULL && bImageName != NULL ) {
00139             return aImageName->getValue() < bImageName->getValue();
00140          }
00141          
00142          // Did not contain an image_name arg. 
00143          // The features are considered equal.
00144          return false;
00145       }
00146       
00147    private:
00151       const TileMap* m_map;
00152 };
00153 
00154 class WritableTileMap : public TileMap {
00155    
00156 public:
00157    
00165    WritableTileMap(const TileMapParams& params, 
00166                    const TileMapFormatDesc& mapDesc,
00167                    uint16 importanceType,
00168                    int nbrFeatures );
00169 
00173    virtual ~WritableTileMap();
00174    
00178    inline uint32 add( TileFeature* feature );
00179 
00183    inline void addName( uint32 featureIndex, const char* name );
00184 
00188    inline void complete();
00189 
00194    WritableTileFeature* getCurrentNewFeature(int32 type);
00195    
00196 private:
00200    int m_lastFeature;
00201    
00206    map<MC2SimpleString, uint32> m_strIdxByStrMap;
00207    
00212    map<uint32, uint32> m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap;
00213 };

00215 // --- Inlined methods ---
00216 
00217 inline uint32 
00218 WritableTileMap::add( TileFeature* feature ) 
00219 {
00220    MC2_ASSERT( feature == &m_features[ m_lastFeature ] );
00221    return m_lastFeature++;
00222 }
00223 
00224 inline void 
00225 WritableTileMap::addName( uint32 featureIndex, const char* name ) 
00226 {    
00227    MC2SimpleString str( name );
00228 
00229    uint32 strIdx = 0;
00230    map<MC2SimpleString, uint32>::const_iterator it = 
00231       m_strIdxByStrMap.find( str );
00232    if ( it != m_strIdxByStrMap.end() ) {
00233       // Already present among the strings.
00234       strIdx = it->second;
00235    } else {
00236       // Not present, so add it.
00237       strIdx = m_strings.size();
00238       m_strIdxByStrMap.insert( make_pair( str, strIdx ) );
00239       m_strings.push_back( str );
00240    }
00241    
00242    m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap.insert( make_pair( featureIndex, strIdx ) );
00243    
00244 }
00245 
00246 inline void
00247 WritableTileMap::complete()
00248 {
00249    // Everything is added to the map now.
00250 
00251    // Resize the vector and set the default string index to -1 (no string).
00252    m_strIdxByFeatureIdx.resize( m_features.size(), -1 );
00253 
00254    
00255    // Sort the features and strings.
00256    vector<int> featureIndexVec( m_features.size() );
00257    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < featureIndexVec.size(); ++i ) {
00258       featureIndexVec[ i ] = i;
00259    }
00260    
00261    FeatureIndexSorter featureIndexSorter( this );
00262    std::sort( featureIndexVec.begin(), featureIndexVec.end(), 
00263               featureIndexSorter );
00264    
00265    vector<TileFeature> oldFeatures( m_features.size() );
00266    m_features.swap( oldFeatures );
00267    
00268    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < featureIndexVec.size(); ++i ) {
00269       // i is the new index.
00270       int oldIndex = featureIndexVec[ i ];
00271       // Check if feature i has a string.
00272       map<uint32,uint32>::const_iterator findIt = 
00273          m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap.find( oldIndex );
00274       if ( findIt != m_strIdxByFeatureIdxMap.end() ) {
00275          int strIdx = findIt->second;
00276          m_strIdxByFeatureIdx[ i ] = strIdx;
00277          m_featureIdxInTextOrder.push_back( i );
00278       }
00279       m_features[ i ] = oldFeatures[ oldIndex ];
00280       // Avoid that the args are deleted when the oldfeatures are 
00281       // destructed since the assignment operator 
00282       // only copies the arg pointers.
00283       oldFeatures[ oldIndex ].m_args.clear();
00284    }
00285 }
